kannada_original: ನುಡಿ ಸತ್ಯ, ಬಿಡು ಹಿಂಸೆ, ಮರೆ ಮೋಹ - ಅದು ಧರ್ಮ ;
english_transliteration: Nuḍi satya, biḍu himse, mare mōha - adu dharma;
english_translation: Speak truth, renounce violence, forget attachment (Mohā) – that is Dharma;
Like conduct without politeness, is Dharma without compassion (Daya).
That is the foundation for essential happiness, joy, and the supreme state (Paramapada)
Dharma is the essence of Siddhas (Siddharasa) – Muddu Rama.
